name: Happy Time Cafeteria Project 02: A la Carte
name_original: Happy Time Cafeteria Project 02: A la Carte
description:
Happy Time Cafeteria Project 02: A la Carte is an arcade game developed by HTC Project. It came out on 01-01-2000. HTC Project published the game.
You can play Happy Time Cafeteria Project 02: A la Carte on PC.
